text: [Music] Morrison farming was formed in 2008 um prior to that I was farming in partnership with my brother Richard and my Father John and and um and we were on half of the original uh Family Farm since um since 1864 and over the other side of the road uh was a distant cousin gram uh working away battling Away by himself on the other half of the original business so so we'd always sort of thought well it would be nice to to get the original land back together as one piece conflict can be an interesting part of um of Family Farms I guess um I guess um we have our moments uh at Morrison farming uh like like like a lot of families so so but look one of the great things that that alleviates a lot of the tension or or some of the conflict anyway is the fact that um is that we now have a bigger area um from 450 acres we're now up to 35,000 Acres so we're not living and working in each other's Pockets we also have um have have different skill sets and interests within the farming business so so each of the each of the directors uh has looks after different portfolios and oversees those Parts sure they have to um turn up to the the Morrison farming meetings and and and justify their performance and that they've reached their kpis um but we all have the um the freedom to to to work uh with ourselves or or or with others and um work on work on the portfolios that we're in charge of
